content: **knitted socks in drops fabel the piece is worked top down with stocking stitch sizes 35 - 43 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-531 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot-length approx 22-24-26 cm leg height approx 12-13-14 cm **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 1114 light pearl grey **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
